content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisablePolicy path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/policy_groups/{policy_group_id}/policies/{policy_id}/disable content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name policygroupid
desc a waf policy group id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name policyid
desc a waf policy id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable a policy
responses
title: 17_Policies_DisablePolicy_93.json
